renderer.vr.get_current_pass: Returns the current render pass, as a string
renderer.vr.is_first_pass: Gets if this is the first pass of a frame
host.vr.is_active: Gets if VR is active locally
host.vr.get_room_pose:
Returns VR pose data relative to your room
This is only updated once a frame, you should wrap this in a renderer:isFirstPass() check
host.vr.get_world_pose:
Returns VR pose data relative to the world
This is only updated once a frame, you should wrap this in a renderer:isFirstPass() check
host.vr.trigger_haptic_pulse:
Triggers a haptic pulse for a given body part
Takes a body part as a string, and a duration for the pulse to last
Optionally also accepts a frequency in hz, an amplitude and a delay before triggering
These arguments may or may not have an effect depending on what vendor your hardware is from
host.vr.open_keyboard: Forces the VR keyboard to open
host.vr.close_keyboard: Forces the VR keyboard to close
player.vr.is_in_vr: Gets if the given player is in VR or not
player.vr.get_pose:
Returns VR pose data for a player, relative to the world
This is effectively only updated every tick, and can return strange values if executed in world_render
